**Welcome to z-brains's documentation!**
========================================================

*z-brains* is dope.

.. raw:: html

   <br>

Breaking news Ô∏è‚Äçüì∞
--------------------------------------------------------
`z-brains` is almost a thing!


About üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è
--------------------------------------------------------
*z-brains* identify patient-specific anomalies in brain morphology and microstructure, 
using features with previously demonstrated potential to accurately localize epileptogenic lesions.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:
   :caption: Getting started

   pages/01.install/index

--------------------------------------------------------

.. raw:: html

   <br>


Core development team üß†
--------------------------------------------------------

z-brains is developed by members of the MICA-lab (https://mica-mni.github.io) and collaborators at the McConnell Brain Imaging Centre of the Montreal Neurological Institute and Harvard Medical School.

- **Jessica Royer**, *MICA Lab - Montreal Neurological Institute*
- **Sara Larivi√®re**, *Brigham and Women's Hospital | Harvard Medical School*
